General.Name: APB Apranga
General.Description: APB Apranga engages in the retail trade of apparel in the Baltic States. The company primarily operates in Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia through franchising agreements with various brands. It sells its products through stores, as well as online. APB Apranga was founded in 1945 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania. APB Apranga operates as a subsidiary of MG Investment UAB.
